text: Fritz Schösser (24 June 1947 – 28 May 2019) was a German politician. He was a member of the Social Democratic Party (SPD). He was the chairman of the Trade Union Confederation (DGB) in Bavaria from 1990 and 2010. From 1992 to 1994, he was a member of the Bavarian Senate. He was elected to the Landtag of Bavaria in 1994, serving until 1998. From 1998 to 2005, Schösser was a member of the national Bundestag. Schösser was born in Töging am Inn. He was married and had two children. He died on 28 May 2019 in Munich, at the age of 71. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Members of the German Bundestag Category:Politicians from Bavaria Category:Politicians of the Social Democratic Party of Germany
title: Fritz Schösser
